meanings.definition: Coming after the thirteenth in a series.
meanings.sent1: The fourteenth cupcake was decorated with colorful sprinkles.
meanings.sent2: She was the fourteenth person in line to buy tickets for the movie.
meanings.sent3: The fourteenth puppy in the litter had a tiny bow on its tail.
meanings.sent4: The fourteenth star in the sky twinkled brighter than the rest.
meanings.sent5: The fourteenth flower in the garden bloomed late but was the most beautiful.

meanings.sent1: She ate the fourteenth cookie from the jar.
meanings.sent2: The fourteenth slice of pizza was saved for her best friend.
meanings.sent3: The fourteenth crayon in the box was the only one left unused.
meanings.sent4: The fourteenth piece of the puzzle completed the picture perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The fourteenth page of the book held the most exciting twist.

meanings.sent1: On her birthday, she celebrated turning the fourteenth year old.
meanings.sent2: The fourteenth item on the list was the most important.
meanings.sent3: In the race, he crossed the finish line in the fourteenth position.
meanings.sent4: The fourteenth row in the theater offered the best view of the stage.
meanings.sent5: The fourteenth day of the month always brought good luck to her.
